author: rasa112017
title: Escape from UK
text:
Location was perfect.
Most friendly and helpful receptionist ever, so lovely and great first impression of hotel. Couldn't have been more sweet, giving us directions to a function we were attending along with a helpful map, facilitating an early check in. If nothing else had gone right with hotel staff ensured we would have left with a good impression. Fortunately everything about the hotel was exceptional, and we don't give praise lightly. It was clean, stylish, roomy with excellent service in where we had breakfast . Food was very good and service attentive and efficient. Room was well equipped and comfortable. We hope to be back for a longer visit in the future.
